模块 org.overrun.swgl.core
程序包 org.overrun.swgl.core.level

类 FpsCamera

java.lang.Object
org.overrun.swgl.core.level.FpsCamera
所有已实现的接口:
ICamera, ITransformation
public class FpsCamera extends Object implements ICamera
A swgl camera that can only move on xz plane and rotate on yaw and pitch.
从以下版本开始:
0.1.0
作者:
squid233
